mapper.select: SELECT VHC.VHC_ID AS VHC_ID , VHC.VHC_NO AS VHC_NO , DVC.DVC_ID AS DVC_ID , DVC.INST_LOC AS INST_LOC , DVC.MNG_ID AS MNG_ID , RSV.RSV_ID AS RSV_ID , RSV.RSV_DATE AS RSV_DATE , RSV.DVC_ID AS DVC_ID , RSV.ORGA_ID AS ORGA_ID , ORGA.ORGA_NM AS ORGA_NM , RSV.COMPLETE_YN AS COMPLETE_YN FROM BM_VHC_INFO VHC LEFT JOIN BM_DVC_INFO DVC ON VHC.VHC_ID = DVC.VHC_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM BM_VDO_RSV WHERE COMPLETE_YN = 'N') RSV ON DVC.DVC_ID = RSV.DVC_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM SM_DL_CD_INFO WHERE CO_CD = 'DVC_KIND') DL ON DVC.DVC_KIND = DL.DL_CD LEFT JOIN BM_VDO_ORGA ORGA ON RSV.ORGA_ID = ORGA.ORGA_ID WHERE DVC.DVC_KIND = 'CD003'
